name: Rival Sniper
description:
Rival Sniper is a game about taking out targets at an party.

You’ll have to make sure no one notices you or at least that no one manages to get to a phone!

Later, you’ll meet a rival sniper, who’s not as skilled as you. It’s up to you to make sure they doesn’t mess it up.

Controls

  • AIM - Move Mouse
  • SHOOT - Left Mouse Button
  • TOGGLE CRT - C
